entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
